description: Vintage high-waisted pleated trousers with a tapered leg, crafted from a velvet-like fabric.
A short pleated skirt featuring a brown and grey plaid pattern with a dark denim belted waistband.
a small red rectangular crossbody purse with a long thin strap
A sleeveless, midi slip dress with thin spaghetti straps and a straight neckline, featuring a slightly sheer fabric layer.
sleeveless high-neck dress with textured details on the chest
High-waisted belted shorts featuring a light green and cream plaid pattern with front pleats.
A long-sleeved button-up knit cardigan featuring an intricate blue and white geometric pattern with brown and light blue striped accents at the cuffs and hem.
A pair of black pleated trousers with a straight-leg cut and belt loops.
A dark olive green knitted sweater vest featuring a V-neck and contrasting ochre-colored fuzzy trim at the collar, armholes, and hem.
black lace-up leather oxford shoe with a thick sole
High-waisted wide-leg trousers featuring a subtle pinstripe pattern, a decorative buttoned flap pocket, and pink button closures.
High-waisted pleated wide-leg trousers featuring a buttoned waistband and a front crease.
An olive green textured knit sweater with a crew neck and ribbed cuffs and hem.
A pale yellow corduroy sleeveless overall dress with metal buckles on the shoulder straps and two front patch pockets.
A red short-sleeved t-shirt featuring a large graphic print of a Coca-Cola bottle and the iconic brand logo.
a long-sleeved purple turtleneck sweater with ribbed cuffs and hem
A black mini skirt featuring thin vertical tan pinstripes, a waistband with belt loops, and a front button closure.
A camel-colored long-sleeved turtleneck sweater with ribbed cuffs and hem.
A vintage-style black leather clutch featuring a crocodile-patterned flap and a gold-toned U-shaped buckle detail.
A small navy blue crossbody bag with a gold diagonal pinstripe and star pattern, featuring a gold-tone hexagonal clasp and a long, thin gold chain strap.
